mapper.update:
update member_info
positive = #{positive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opposite = #{opposite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pushStatus = #{pushStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
ncStatus = #{ncStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firstlicens = #{firstlicens,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licenceorg = #{licenceorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

idcardaddress = #{idcardaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licenseType = #{licenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licenseImagePath = #{licenseImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcardimage = #{idcardimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driverimage = #{driverimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

companycontact = #{companycontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

rtblno = #{rtblno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rtblimgurl = #{rtblimgurl,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update member_info set positive = #{positive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opposite = #{opposite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pushStatus = #{pushStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, ncStatus = #{ncStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstlicens = #{firstlicens,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licenceorg = #{licenceorg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usefullife = #{usefullife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcardaddress = #{idcardaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licenseType = #{licenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licenseImagePath = #{licenseImagePath,jdbcType=BIGINT}, submittime = #{submittime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcardimage = #{idcardimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverimage = #{driverimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyname = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companycontact = #{companycontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companycode = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companytel = #{companytel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyaddress = #{companyaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.memberid, m.submittime, m.licenseImagePath, m.username, m.telphone, m.idcard, m.idcardimage, m.driverimage, m.companyname, m.companycontact, m.companycode, m.companytel, m.companyaddress, m.createtime from wuliu_member_vehicle v left join member_info m on v.memberid = m.memberid where v.vehicleid in ( select vehicleid from wuliu_vehicle_driver where driverid=#{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
